title: Acer Predator League is happening in Bangalore!

comments.body: Not a tournament, more like challenges, you complete a set of challenges and gain points, depending on your points/standings, you get Merch

not a league, still you win prizes ðŸ‘€

if you are amongst the top 2 scorers of any of the 4 games, then you also win:

First place - 1 Acer Gaming Monitor + 15,000 prize money + 10,000 Flipkart Voucher
Second place - 1 Acer Gaming Monitor + 10,000 prize money + 5,000 Flipkart Voucher
Ahh shit mb, I meant League of legends XP
Hopefully, but this also looks pretty fun
